name: Codera
tagline: free and open-source multi-user content management system for developers
body: # Welcome to Codera Codera is a free and open-source multi-user content management system for developers. Main purpose is to offer a solution for developers to deploy their software on their own server. The multi user system allows you to restrict certain projects from public access and only allow a few people to see them. In addition you have the opportunity to create additional admins who can maintain your website. Codera allows you to deploy executables or to link webservices/websites you have created. ### For help or installation instructions visit the [Wiki](https://github.com/spaghettic0der/codera/wiki)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
